title: Patient-Centered Communication Simulation Education Program Based on Narrative Medicine

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: VR simulation program replicating real clinical scenarios for medical service industry professionals to train narrative approach competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can practice active listening (attending) to patient narratives and accurately document key content (representing) in VR simulation environments.
Learners enhance their patient-doctor relationship-building skills through empathetic responses (affiliating) that consider cultural differences.
Learners can systematically interpret complex clinical cases and write reports using narrative structure analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
